video.name: Potato Chickpea Spinach Soup in Instant Pot - Saucepan option | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
Chickpea Potato Soup in Instant Pot. Saucepan option on Post
ðŸ”—FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/03/veggie-chickpea-potato-soup-in-instant-pot.html

This simple Potato Chickpea and Veggie Soup comes together very quickly, has an amazing flavor profile from thyme, oregano, fennel seeds and some pepper and cinnamon, and is hearty and pleasing. Use beans such as white beans or kidney for variation, and kale/other greens for variation. 

Water saute some onion and garlic, mix in the rest of the ingredients and pressure cook or cook in a saucepan. Fold in greens and done. Make it creamy or brothy as you prefer. For creamier, blend up a portion of the soup and mix in. Some Non Dairy milks tend to separate under pressure, See post for best options. Separated milk is fine to eat, it just doesnt look that good. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Nut-free Oil-free Recipe.

recipeIngredient: 1/2 tsp thyme ( or use  a tsp fresh rosemary)
1  large potato (cubed small ( I use yukon gold or white,))
1/2 cup other veggies like peppers (mushrooms, zucchini, broccoli)
1.25 cups cooked chickpeas or 1 15 oz can chickpeas (drained)
1 cup non dairy milk such as coconut milk (almond milk or cashew milk)
freshly ground black pepper for garnish (, lemon juice (optional))

recipeInstructions.text: Add broth in the Instant Pot on saute. Add onion and garlic cook until golden. Deglaze with a tbsp of water in between if needed. (See Stove top Saucepan instructions in Recipe note section below. )
recipeInstructions.name: Add broth in the Instant Pot on saute. Add onion and garlic cook until golden. Deglaze with a tbsp of water in between if needed. (See Stove top Saucepan instructions in Recipe note section below. )

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped tomato and mix. Add the spices and herbs and mix in.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chopped tomato and mix. Add the spices and herbs and mix in.

recipeInstructions.text: Add veggies, chickpeas, salt, non dairy milk ** and water and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add veggies, chickpeas, salt, non dairy milk ** and water and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for (manual, hi) 5 minutes, let the pressure release naturally.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for (manual, hi) 5 minutes, let the pressure release naturally.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in spinach and saute for a minute. Add thick cashew cream for creamier soup and mix in.Â Add black pepper and lemon juice. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Serve with crackers, garlic rolls or garlic bread.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in spinach and saute for a minute. Add thick cashew cream for creamier soup and mix in.Â Add black pepper and lemon juice. Taste and adjust salt and flavor. Serve with crackers, garlic rolls or garlic bread.
